string-array.item: Making ends meet and working well

string-array.name: descriptions
string-array.item: Our goal: Vancouver's children have the best chance of enjoying a healthy childhood. \n\nOur target: 85% of Vancouver’s children are developmentally ready for school when they enter kindergarten

Our goal: A range of affordable housing choices is available for all Vancouverites \n\nOur targets: End street homelessness, enable 2,900 new supportive housing units, and add 5,000 new social housing units
Our goal: A healthy, just, and sustainable food system \n\nOur target: Increase citywide and neighbourhood food assets by a minimum of 50% by 2020

Our goal: Equitable access to high-quality social, community, and health services \n\nOur target: A family doctor for every Vancouver resident, and increase number of citizens who report having access to services when they need them by 25%

Our goal: Adequate income and access to a broad range of healthy employment opportunities \n\nOur target: Reduce the city’s poverty rate by 75%, and an increase the median income by at least 3% every year
